payload.description: Update advisor_checkins.py to support 'superadmin' role. Replace occurrences of `user_response.data.get('role') == 'admin'` with `user_response.data.get('role') in ['admin', 'superadmin']` (2 occurrences at lines 124, 162)
payload.context: Adding proper superadmin role differentiation. Superadmins should have same permissions as admins for checkins.
